Description.Name: Habitats Galore!
Description.Details: A knock sounds on your door. You look up to see Darius standing in the open doorway with a well dressed woman, "Darius, come in. I presume this is the representative from Habitats Galore?" Darius and his companinon enter your office, "Yes it is. Commander {COMMANDER.LastName} may please introduce you to Ms Berrix." You stand up from your desk and extend your hand, "Pleased to meet you Ms Berrix, you may call me {COMMANDER.FirstName}." Ms Berrix shakes your hand, "Please, call me Izelda, nice to meet you as well." Darius hands you a noteputer, "Here is the quote for upgrading the Beta Pod to allow up to 8 more MechWarriors in our company. We have three options to choose from and I..." You hold up you hand, "Thank you Darius, but if you don't mind, I'm interested in what Izelda recommends." Darius stops talking and defers to Izelda, "Well, {COMMANDER.FirstName}, as Darius has already pointed out, in there you will see three options for upgrading the Argo's Beta Pod: Option 1 - Decline the offer. You will only be out of pocket ¢10,000 to cover my expenses here; Option 2 - Cost Saver Package. The Habitat Galore Cost Saver package aims to work with those companies that are on a very tight budget. As such, the cost is subtantially lower, but there could be design/install issues; Option 3 - Standard Package. With the Standard Package, you get most amenities and our workmanship is reflected in the cost. While we can't say it will be flawless, we haven't had anyone with issues to date, that we know about; Option 4 - Premium Package. This is the ultimate in meticulous installation and quality control. Everything is triple-checked in person as well as thermographic, magnetic and sonar structural integrity scans." Darius looks over to you, "What is your decision, Commander?"

Description.Name: Decline Assessment
Description.Details: Non-participation

Description.Name: Maybe another day...
Description.Details:
You mull over everything Izelda Berrix has just outlined to you, while glancing through the precise data on the noteputer.  As you hand the noteputer back to Darius, you turn towards Izelda, "I do appreciate your company sending you out this way, but I think we will wait for now.  I do not want to make a hasty decision and end up regretting the choice.  I do hope you understand."

Ms Berrix smiles sweetly, "That is an understandable choice and one that many beforey you have also made.  I will arrange the partial refund of your consultation fee and please feel free to contact us again should you wish to proceed."

Description.Name: Unlock Beta Pod Upgrade
Description.Details: [Cost Saver Package: ¢300,000]

Description.Name: On the Cheap
Description.Details: You mull over everything Izelda Berrix has just outlined to you, while glancing through the precise data on the noteputer. As you hand the noteputer back to Darius, you turn towards Izelda, "Thank you for this information. I think we will need to go with the Cost Saver Package. We are on a pretty tight budget and while I realise there are potential risks and issues, the savings will go towards keeping {COMPANY.CompanyName} afloat. Darius, make the arrangements." Darius nods as he escorts Ms Berrix back to her DropShip, "Understood, Commander" BETA POD UPGRADE UNLOCKED VISIT ENGINEERING TO BEGIN UPGRADE CONSTRUCTION

The higher quality workmanship and zero risk will boost morale which benefit {COMPANY.CompanyName} immensely. Darius, make the arrangements."
